TopicTitle: FIXED KSP Desktop Icon (+two new ones)

Articles.Content:
I went ahead and redid the original for anyone who didn't want to switch but wanted to clean up the look a little but, and here are the two other ones I've done incase anyone hasn't seen them. If you use normal sized windows icons (atleast in vista) it makes it look very pixelated and generally messed up.

Low resolution friendly original

I took a screen cap of the from the buy now button on the website and made him my icon.

If you wanna use it just right click the KSP shortcut on your desktop and go to properties, and then Change Icon. Then just point it to where you saved the .ico

Tiny Jeb

Version 3, taken from the wallpaper released by SQUAD

Jeb's Face

What they look like on dark and light backgrounds.

They're all 64x64

Edited October 4, 2012 by lemonhands

Here's what it looks like, just a little jeb. The original icon it came with didn't work very well with darker backgrounds as there were leftover white pixels all over it, so I took a screen cap of from the buy now button on the website and made him my icon.

If you wanna use it just right click the KSP shortcut on your desktop and go to properties, and then Change Icon. Then just point it to where you saved the .ico

http://www.filedropper.com/kspicon

Thank you! The only ugly icon on my desktop is now pretty.
Yes thank you, this looks a lot better then the default one.
This one definitely looks better, thanks for this.

Posted a second one, it's in the first post.

More than two-year old necro.

Can you fix the links?

Linux has no icon at all, so I need one

install alacarte, it allows you to change applications icons as well as give regular scripts icons in your application launcher. KSP's actual icon wont be changed but you can add a nice HD clicky one for your dock or other launcher
